pages.text: Certain powerful enchantments can $(l)only$() be obtained through the $(#b38cff)Alchemy Table$(). These enchantments cannot be found in the enchanting table, traded from villagers, or obtained through fishing.

pages.title: Excavation
pages.text: $(#b38cff)Excavation$() allows mining tools to break blocks in a 3×3 area. Works on pickaxes, shovels, axes, and hoes of $(l)Diamond tier or higher$().$(br2)Can be combined with other enchantments in the Alchemy Table.

pages.title: Elytra Flight
pages.text: $(#b38cff)Elytra Flight$() grants the ability to glide and fly when worn on a chestplate, without needing an actual elytra.$(br2)$(4)Note:$() Uses alchemical materials instead of end-game items for balance.

pages.title: Combining Enchantments
pages.text: $(l)The Alchemy Table acts like an Anvil:$()$(br2)• Place an enchanted book in one slot$(br)• Place a tool/armor in another slot$(br)• The enchantments will combine$(br)• You can also combine two enchanted books$(br2)$(4)Important:$() Only 2 items at a time - the book/tool combination, nothing else!

pages.title: All Alchemy Enchantments
pages.text: $(l)Excavation$() - 3×3 mining for diggers$(br2)$(l)Elytra Flight$() - Fly without elytra$(br2)$(l)Blasting$() - Enhanced explosion effects$(br2)$(l)Experience Boost$() - Increased XP drops$(br2)$(l)Swift Step$() - Movement speed on boots$(br2)$(l)Needle Throw$() - Projectile attacks$(br2)$(l)Lead Coated$() - Special protection
